Reviews.Title: “Perfect for low-budgets”
Reviews.Author: mawie49
Reviews.Content: stayed night june satisfied stay bathrooms size clean overall little sprucing mean night fine view window actually peak sacré coeur didnt hotel breakfast pâtisserie grocery store front hotel isnt seedy night probably walked didnt fear security purse city wits youll fine

HotelInfo.Name: Kyriad Paris IX Montmartre
HotelInfo.Address: 55 rue Jean-Baptiste Pigalle | 9th Arr., 75009 Paris, France
